parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (11240060), which is typically associated with electoral campaign materials in Romania.  This strongly suggests the post is related to an electoral campaign.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>While the post doesn't explicitly name a candidate, the image attached to the post clearly shows the logo and candidates of the REPER party for the Senate elections in Dâmbovița County. This directly refers to candidates participating in the elections, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement targeting Dâmbovița County, Romania. Facebook is a public platform, and paid advertisements are designed to reach a wide audience, not just individuals. This satisfies Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The post's text, "Dâmbovița votes REPER on December 1st!", explicitly encourages voters in Dâmbovița County to vote for the REPER party. This clearly has an electoral objective to influence voting behavior, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present information in a journalistic manner. It lacks objectivity and is clearly promotional in nature, aiming to persuade voters rather than inform them.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The post is not a personal opinion; it's a direct call to action promoting a specific political party in an election.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1258668132017843</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to specific candidates (through the image), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has a clear electoral objective of encouraging votes for the REPER party. The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  The post's timing is also crucial; even if the general election period has ended, the specific date mentioned (December 1st) suggests it might be related to a second round or a different election still ongoing.  There are no counterarguments to suggest this is not electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>MOLEAVIN ADRIAN</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>DOGARU GEORGETA</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>REPER</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
REPER Dâmbovița, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 1258668132017843) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, cu mesajul „Dâmbovița votează REPER pe 1 decembrie!”, care promovează în mod direct candidații Moleavin Adrian și Dogaru Georgeta pentru Senat, din partea partidului REPER, având ca efect electoral influențarea votului în favoarea acestora.  Reclama, care a avut o estimare a acoperirii de 100.000-500.000 de persoane,  conține un număr CMF (11240060), specific materialelor de campanie electorală, și a fost plătită cu o sumă sub 100 RON.  Informațiile de contact ale advertiserului sunt: steluta.munteanu@partidulreper.ro și +40720412010.  Această acțiune constituie propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie, conform legislației în vigoare.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
